entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few rain showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
